name: Tap Battle Multiplayer (Photon)
description:
DEMO

ORIGINAL STORE

made with construct 2

Features:

  • Mobile optimized (Android)
  • Multiplayer (Photon)
  • Anti-cheat optimized
  • Ads optimized (Banner, interstitial & video reward)
  • IAP supported (Buy diamond with google play)
  • Battle mode (PvP & AI)
  • Leaderboard support
  • Detect first nickname (by device name)
  • Shop menu (use coin & diamond convert)
  • 4 Skill (Energy decrease, overload, steal, defense)
  • Language preset (English & Indonesia)
  • User statistic (Tap, match, win rate etc)
  • 10 level name (Stalker ~ King Hunter)
  • Cool animation
  • Number events: 376
  • Include php files
  • Much more...

The project uses 3rd party addons:

[Free]

  • Plugin 'Advanced Text box' by Pinco
  • Plugin 'Loader by Gigatron
  • Plugin 'CSV' by Rex.Rainbow
  • Behavior 'Ig_Shake by Luiz Gama
  • Behavior 'EaseTween' by Yeremia Al (lunarray)
  • Behavior 'MoveTo' by Rex.Rainbow
  • Behavior 'Pin to image point by Rex.Rainbow

[Paid]

  • Plugin 'Ultimate Ads' by Toby R
  • Plugin 'Ultimate IAP' by Toby R
  • Plugin 'Cordova Device by cranberrygame
  • Plugin 'Cordova NetworkInfo' by cranberrygame
  • Plugin 'Cordova StatusBar' by cranberrygame
  • Plugin 'Cordova Toast by cranberrygame
  • Behavior 'Animated Counter by Toby R

*** Addons installation ***

  • Place plugin folder into '<install path>\exporters\html5\plugins'
  • Place behavior folder into '<install path>\exporters\html5\behaviors'

*** NOTE ***

  • Please buy 3rd party addons for using this template.
  • This template not documented inline.
  • Full support is available for this item.
